name: Chapter One: The Invitation
description: This is the first installment of the Immortal Justice series. You, the player, are a undiscovered journalist who had just been invited to a large party for rich billionaires. You entered yourself as an option to be selected to spend a week with all of them as a joke, but soon you are ACTUALLY INVITED as the Honorary Guest of Mr. Apollyon Steel. The twist is, the billionaires are WEREWOLVES. That's right. Big, furry, scary killing machines. Or are they? What if they were just looking to connect? Make a few friends? You find out really quickly that you are going to have to learn how to discern friend from foe, using the clues you find to find the truth. Are you going to find the source of the unforeseen Evil in Apollyon's mansion? Or will you die trying?
